# expirationDate

**Instance Property**

The date after which the activity is no longer eligible for Handoff or indexing.

## Declaration

```swift
var expirationDate: Date? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If you don’t set the value of this property, the system automatically expires the activity after a period of time.

## Specifying the activity’s eligibility

- **isEligibleForHandoff**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the activity can be continued on another device using Handoff.
- **isEligibleForSearch**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the activity should be added to the on-device index.
- **isEligibleForPublicIndexing**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the activity can be publicly accessed by all iOS users.
